trans-unit.source: Recognizes ink gestures.
trans-unit.target: Riconosce i movimenti di input penna.

trans-unit.source: A GestureRecognizer identifies an ink gesture.
trans-unit.target: Un GestureRecognizer identifica un movimento di input penna.

trans-unit.source: You can set the GestureRecognizer to recognize all or a subset of application gestures.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare GestureRecognizer per riconoscere tutti o solo un sottoinsieme dei movimenti di applicazione.

trans-unit.source: To set the GestureRecognizer to recognize a subset of the available gestures, pass an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> array to the constructor or use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per impostare GestureRecognizer per riconoscere un sottoinsieme dei movimenti disponibili, passare un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>matrice al costruttore o utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> contains a gesture, call the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare se un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>contiene un movimento, chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: # # XAML testo utilizzo non è possibile utilizzare questa classe nella [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When it is created with this constructor, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes all application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene creato con questo costruttore, il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>riconosce tutti i movimenti di applicazione.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use the GestureRecognizer constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes a subset of the application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il costruttore GestureRecognizer per creare un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>che riconosce un sottoinsieme dei movimenti dell'applicazione.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that specifies the application gestures the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> will recognize.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"> </xref> che specifica i movimenti dell'applicazione di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> verrà riconosciuto.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you finish using the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il metodo Dispose al termine dell'utilizzo di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, after calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, pertanto, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>occupata.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i movimenti che il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> riconosce.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that contains gestures the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> is set to recognize.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"> </xref> che contiene i movimenti di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> per impostazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean that indicates whether the gesture recognizer is available on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore booleano che indica se il gestore di riconoscimento è disponibile nel sistema dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the recognition component is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il componente di riconoscimento è disponibile. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Looks for gestures in the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cerca i movimenti specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the Recognize method is sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: La matrice restituita dal metodo Riconosci verrà ordinata i <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, Recognize may return a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> array with the following values: |Index|ApplicationGesture|RecognitionConfidence| |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |0|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |1|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |2|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |3|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes that it is very likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a check mark, relatively likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in not a gesture, and not at all likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a curlicue or a double curlicue.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, riconoscere può restituire una matrice di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>con i valori seguenti: | Indice | ApplicationGesture | RecognitionConfidence | |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |&0; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&1; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&2; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&3; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| Ciò significa che il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>riconosce che è molto probabile che il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>è un segno di spunta, che il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, non un movimento e non che il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>sia un ricciolo o un doppio ricciolo.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Recognize method can return an array with <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> at a higher <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> than other application gestures.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Riconosce il metodo può restituire una matrice con <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>con una <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>rispetto ad altri movimenti dell'applicazione.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>

trans-unit.source: This means that it is more likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is not a gesture, as opposed to a gesture that has a lower <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.
trans-unit.target: Ciò significa che è più probabile che <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>non un movimento, anziché un'azione che ha un inferiore <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to search for gestures.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> per cercare i movimenti.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult"></xref> that contains application gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognized.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult"> </xref> che contiene l'applicazione movimenti di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> riconosciuto.

trans-unit.source: Sets the application gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Imposta i movimenti dell'applicazione che il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> riconosce.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that specifies the application gestures you wish the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> to recognize.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"> </xref> che specifica i movimenti dell'applicazione si desidera il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> riconosca.
